tests.name: xaq_prefer_ziv
tests.description: After XAQ, ZIV should be preferred (BEK is invalid)

tests.name: after_one_ziv_valid_continuations
tests.description: After XAQ ZIV, both BEK and ZIV should be likely

tests.name: after_three_zivs_valid_continuations
tests.description: After 3 ZIVs, both BEK and ZIV should be likely

tests.name: no_double_xaq
tests.description: After XAQ, ZIV should be preferred over another XAQ
